attributes.action: Provide the public with honest information regarding how the implementation of the EU Directive 2004/52/EC, the directive that will pave the way for a Europe-wide electronic road toll service, will affect all of us in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In 2004 the Directive 2004/52/EC called ‘on the Inter-Operatability of Electronic Toll Systems in the community’ was born which, paves the way for the following to happen:
1/  Our road-pricing technology will have to have GNSS satellite tracking capability.  2/ The EU is going to set up a Europe-wide electronic toll service. 
3/ One single contract between users of the road and a pricing (tolling) service is the goal of the European electronic toll service.  The aim- ”one contract per customer, one box per vehicle.” 
4/ The EU itself, not just our government, reserves the right to impose road pricing on us!  

The EU is serious – it has also funded the RCI project which demonstrates the interoperability of Road Charging between 6 EU countries.  As part of the project it will show how any road charging transaction in Europe could be carried out with a single set of in-vehicle equipment. 
 
We need to know the truth, as to exactly how the government is going roll this one out and how it will affect all of us!
